text:
e="preserve">Jean-Louis Bernard (31 March 1938 – 26 March 2020) was a French politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of France and represents the Loiret department from 1993 to 2012. He was a member of the Radical Party. He was the mayor of Orléans from 1988 to 1989. Bernard was born in Saulieu, Côte-d'Or.
Bernard died on 26 March 2020 at the age of 81.
